description.zh-cn: 中国作家，山药蛋派成员。曾任山西省文学艺术界联合会副主席、山西省作家协会副主席，为中国作家协会名誉委员。
description.en: Chinese writer and a member of the Shanyaodan School. He formerly served as the vice chairman of the Shanxi Federation of Literary and Art Circles, the vice chairman of the Shanxi Writers Association, and was an honorary member of the China Writers Association.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的省份。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国山西省晋中市下辖的县，胡正的出生地。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Jinzhong City, Shanxi Province, People's Republic of China, and the birthplace of Hu Zheng.

description.zh-cn: 中国当代文学的一个重要流派，以山西作家群为主体。
description.en: An important school of modern Chinese literature, mainly composed of writers from Shanxi.

nodes.id: 山西省文学艺术界联合会

zh-cn: 山西省文学艺术界联合会
en: Shanxi Federation of Literary and Art Circles

description.en: Hu Zheng was born in Lingshi, Shanxi.

description.zh-cn: 胡正是山药蛋派的成员。
description.en: Hu Zheng was a member of the Shanyaodan School.

relationships.target: 山西省文学艺术界联合会

description.zh-cn: 胡正曾担任山西省文学艺术界联合会副主席。
description.en: Hu Zheng formerly served as the Vice Chairman of the Shanxi Federation of Literary and Art Circles.

description.zh-cn: 胡正曾担任山西省作家协会副主席。
description.en: Hu Zheng formerly served as the Vice Chairman of the Shanxi Writers Association.

description.zh-cn: 胡正是中国作家协会名誉委员。
description.en: Hu Zheng was an honorary member of the China Writers Association.

description.zh-cn: 根据维基百科分类，胡正是中国共产党党员。
description.en: According to Wikipedia categories, Hu Zheng was a member of the Communist Party of China.
